CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Xometry_ERP_Contact_ID__c)) , HYPERLINK("https://erp.xometry.com/quotes-orders?start=0&length=50&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=4&order%5B0%5D%5B%5D=desc&search%5Bsearch%5D="+ Xometry_ERP_Contact_ID__c +"&n_columns=19","Go to this Contact in the ERP", "_blank"), "No ERP Contact information Provided")
CustomField.label: ERP Contact Quotes/Orders
